S.FORM: = Luxembourg = Gaga kska Owcow ka Luxembourg, 49 45 N, 6 10 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 2,586 sq km(hangan na o Tg179) (knlbanga dxgal o 2,586 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 582,291 hiyi. Gaga Luxembourg ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 23 idas 6 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Luxembourg ga wada sugan 50.70% ka dxgal qpahan, 33.50% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 15.80% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Henri, pnaah hngkawas2000 idas 10 jiyax 7pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Luxembourg = Luxembourg Takongkwo u splawa Luxembourg, mtlibu mtqiri Luxembourg ka France, Germany, Belgium, wa mniq Oco mi qnlhangan neyru ka Luxembourg, kiya ka mnsngari murux bay Takongkwo mniq Oco saya, sotu ka Luxembourg su. Tumal kcka Omong ka Luxembourg, alaw kcka tndxral pa niqan Hoing Oco, Snciying Oco, Oco Tocu Inhang mi knou bay Omong ciko kiya splawa babaw lmutuc Purusayar mi Straspaw Oco na "Tu3 Sotu". Ri-s Rikisi Luxembourg pa speyyah kndadax congsuci cida smnluwan qnalang qnhlangan Luxembourg prading smnru. Mnhdu smmalu qnalang qnhlangan daw, prading kndudul mrana kana ka sssiyaw niya, wada mssli kingal beyhing alang mkbrnux. Wa mniq nniqan mndungus bay ccbuwan ka Luxembourg, France, Germany mi Netherlands pa snbeyhing bay qmita kana, knttu yahan mssriyux knrmux mangal qnlhangan icil ka Luxembourg. 19 th cida, Luxembourg u prading mdukuricu qnlhangan dhiya nanaq qmlahang dhiya nanaq, kiya mi spuda Netherlands Ryeynhe Wangkwo qmhahang, dhuq dukuricu ka Belgium, kiya ka wada ptalax qmnlahang Netherlands ka Luxembourg. Ana so wada pkla kari muda pnwaya congri ka Luxembourg, binaw mniq 20 th pa, mnsnpusal yahan knrmux mangal Germany ka Luxembourg. Tumn1 qnlangan beyhing mccbu cida kngkawas 1914 idas 8 diyax 2, Doicu Tikwo u muda Surihun Keykaku mi wada ini biyaw knrmux mangal Luxembourg mi knrmux cnbu Belgium mi France, wada trawah ka ccbuwan tuiwil, Tumn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbu iyax cida, dnmuwi hmrinas mkmaxal puciping ka Luxembourg u, alaw mmusa knrmux Belgium mi France mi wada dan knrmux Nacwey Doicu ka Luxembourg uri, wada pkixan msupu Tongmongkwo mccbu, kiya mi miyah cnbu ka Doicu cida u tnayis bay wada ngalang Doicu ka Luxembourg, Tumn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbu u wana Luxembourg ka tumal mccbu mi uka ana taxa mhuqil. Babaw Tumn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbu daw, ini uda pnwaya congri ka Luxembourg da, wada mwaya balay pnhiyu Peyyey mi Omong kaying qnlhangan uri. Ceng-c Pnwaya muda Cyuncu Phiyu Kngpo ka Luxembourg. Yeso qnlhangan ka Takong Luxembourg, kiya ka knkana Oco murux bay Takongkwo. Kiya mi biyax dmuwi singcng u neyke ka muda dmuwi biyax. Kokoingkay u niqan 60 hiyi, mntxan u 5 kngkawas ka diyax qpahun gying. Sing-ceng cyu-hwa Luxembourg pa psnakan 12 keyng, trahuc u psuwan 102 ka sucn Dungan. Niqan 12 sucn u mndungus bay hnyuwan alang mkbrnux ka Luxembourg, kiya mi Luxembourg alang mkbrnux beyhing ka tubeyhing bay alang mkbrnux. Cyu ka mntu1 ci singcng cyuhwa Luxembourg, mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 10 diyax 3 cida daw wada plihan da. Kngkawas 1659 dhuq kngkawas 1839 iyax cida, Luxembourg u wada psnakan 3 huncyu, kiya mi hiti daw wada mnduma dxral Belgium, France mi Germany saya da, tndxral Luxembourg pa kndadax 10,700 pinghwang km mlih dhuq 2,586 pinghwang km saya. Keyng na Luxembourg Kapeyrun keyng (1), Kraywo keyng (2), Tikisi keyng (3), Aysitnah keyng (4), Aarcet Hpanays keyng (5), Kreywenmah keyng (6), Luxembourg keyng (7), Meyars keyng (8), Reytangju keyng (9), Reymisi keyng (10), Huyantng keyng (11), Weyarc keyng (12) Ti-ri Luxembourg u wa mniq Tuiwil Oco dxral kcka, lnlingay dxral u baraw ka tudaya mitruma ka tuhunac, narac u lmutuc Germany ka tunarac, lmutuc France ka tuhunac, lmutuc Belgium ka tudaya mi tuiwil. Tudaya u tubaraw dxral Yaayting, tqapur bay lmiqu, tuhunac u dxral llbu dwiyaq. Knbaka ka knkarac, mnknkarac muxul tay hayyangsing, mndungus bay qtan ka lnlingay. Sotu Luxembourg alang mkbrnux beyhing u splawa dha "Alang mkbrnux phpah". Kari bay xxiluy kwang. Hini uri u pusu balay ddaun cong th. Knbaraw balay dwiyaq ka dwiyaq Kneyhu, knbaraw niya u 560 m. Mabang 1 m dwiyaq Pukpurac, kiya u tquwan balay sediq knbaraw bay dwiyaq Luxembourg ka dwiyaq Pukpurac. Cing-ci Niqan knkana qnlangan babaw dxral knou bay jncyun GDP ka Luxembourg. Kndadax1999 prading, ida nanaq Oyeyncyu uri ka Luxembourg. Pusu balay stmanan keyjay Luxembourg u quri kongyey, saya daw knbeyhing bay cinjong congsin knkana mtqiri qnlangan babaw dxral uri. Luxembourg ka pusu balay kcka Oyeycyu sjn inhang congsin mi knkana qnlangan tu2 tocu sintwo congsin (msnul Amirika). Se-hwey Minjoku Knhbrawan sediq Luxembourg pa kiya ka knkana qnlhangan Luxembourg 50.9%. Mnsediq Oropa mi Tasiyang-Porotihay reysing ka sediq Luxembourg. Kari Kari ddiyun seyhu Luxembourg ka kari France, kari Germany, kari Luxembourg. 'Qnlhangan muhing elu jyujika' u ou kluwanan kari ddiyun rmngaw pa, alaw ka hbaraw ou kluwanan minjoku ka mnsupu mniq kiya ka so kiya, kiya mi Luxembourg u uxay so kiya kiya, qnlhangan niyi pnsltudan dha u pusu bay minjoku ka wana murux bay kingal- kiya ka Luxembourg minjoku, minjoku niyi pa quri so dara dha u msdalih hari Franse, binaw quri so rikisi pa bsiyaq bay pnluban kari Germany na 'Knmalu bay Roma Tikwo' uri, kiya mi baraw Oco kongting u dmuwi bay dmuwi kari Franse pprngaw ka luhay pnsltudan dha, kiya ka wada so niyi ddiyun bay ppatas ka kari Germany mi kari Franse da, kiya u uxay balay dnuwi quri ppatas ka kari Luxembourg pa, ddiyun balay pprngaw kari kddiyax kiya. Kari Luxembourg u tukingal cida kari Frank, pusu bay dmuwi kari niyi u wa mniq nniqan yayung Mocear mi mslutuc na alang mkbrnux Germany mi France. Ana so mntubaraw dxral kari Germany na kari Congsi joku ka kari Luxembourg, binaw niqan hmrinas 5000 ka pusu kari Franse. Alaw ka kari tnpusu, kari Luxembourg u sediq Luxembourg pa ngalan dha 'Kari quri qcahur', ddiyun pprngaw kari kndusan kddiyax mi uxay ddiyun quri ppatas. Pnwaya kcka kyoiku u pspuwan dmuwi ka kari Luxembourg, kari Germany mi kari France, psdkanun dmuwi mi ini pqqada. Pyasan tiping laqi so ttiping u dmuwi kari Luxembourg tmsa muyas, tubeyhing hari laqi muyas daw prading dmuwi kari Germany tmsa, pyasan kcka daw prading snbarah dmuwi kari France Dungan. Mdhu dmuwi tu3 kari niyi u mpqhdu muyas pyasan tubaraw ka sediq qnlhangan daha, so kiya u niqan dmka ka laqi mnuyas pyasan tubaraw u ini dhuq mangal patas sucugyo. Mniq so niyi ka pnwaya dha pa, laqi sediq tnhdil (quri so sediq tnhdilan uxay pneyyah Oco) u ini hari qndhuq. Hbaraw balay qnlhangan icil cyawmin ka Luxembourg, hmrinas knkana qnhbrawan qnhlangan 30% knhbrawan, knhbaraw bay sediq tnhdilan qnpringan ka sediq Portugal mi sediq Italiana. Miyah ka dhiya cida u madas kari dha nanaq uri. Binaw, kari Portugal mi kari Italiana u wana srwanan nanaq ddiyun pprngaw sediq tnhdilan, mniq so knhbrawan pnsliyan u ini hari duwi kiya. Cung-cyaw Hbaraw bay ka smluhay Teynskyo, niqan duma ka smluhay snhiyan icil uri (kiya ka knkana Kiristo burah kyo mi Yodayakyo). Bungka Ngalan Qnlangan bunghka yican ka nniqan smudal alang mkbrnux mi nniqan qqlahang mccbu Luxembourg. Damac uuqun Luxembourg pa wada rul qnlhangan Germany, France mi Belgium kiya mi qnlhangan icil ssiyaw uri. Ttgsa Mniq Luxembourg pa, 11 kngkawas ka kokomin yiwu kyoiku: Snpiyah laqi muyas pyasan ttiring 2 kngkawas, pusu slxan kyoiku u 6 kngkawas mi 3 kngkawas ka cincyey kyoiku. So kiya u niqal 1 mi 3 bnkuwan ka pnwaya kyoiku dah (Pyasan tutiring, pyasan tutiping, pyasan tubaraw). Laqi muyas muyas ryu u dhuq 100%. Pnwaya kyoiku Luxembourg pa niqan ou bay uuda pprngaun nina, mray so dmuwi ou bay diyax muda smluhay kari Germany, kari France mi kari Eygo, kiya uri u tukubeycu ka smluhay kari Germany u hbaraw ka ini pndungus, rmngaw kari Roman joku tnhdil qnlhangan icil na laqi muyas ka knhbrawan balay. Kndadax kngkawas 1999 daw, mniq 2 kngkawas pyasan tutoring brah han u muda 1 Kngkawas pnsrmalan muyas pyasan tutiring; so niyi u laqi tiring u malu smluhay quri Kari, syakay, quri sapah pyasan u, malu mangal kingal mndungus syakayhwa. Mniq babaw 6 kngkawas pyasan pusu lhayan daw malu umau 2 elu kyoiku pyasan tukcka ka laqi muyas: 1. Kci kawci pyasan tukcka (67% laqi muyas), qulu bay muyas 3 kngkawas dhuq sucugyo (CATP) kiya uri u mtmay pyasan tubeyhing brah cida u knkana bay u dmuwi kngkawas 6 dhuq 7 kngkawas. 2. Putong pyasan tubaraw (33% laqi muyas). 7 kngkawas daw sucugyo mi mangal patas pnsdhuwan mnhdu muyas kiya mi malu mtmay muyas pyasan tubeyhing. Pnwaya kyoiku ticu niyi u kiya ka knkana qnlhangan tu2 knou syakay yosang 11.3%. Binaw quri so 15 kngkawas laqi muyas mniq kcka mtqiri qnlangan knkla laqi muyas pingku keykaku u ida so mntna hari kana. Pyasan tubaraw kluwanan kyoiku Kndadax kngkawas 2003 daw niqan 1 dukuricu pyasan tubeyhing Luxembourg, kiya mi snpeyyah kngkawas 2001 prading smmalu phiyu. Mniq quri iswey ringyu, ida nkiya kswey, kci, horicu, keyjay, slhayan syakay mi slhayan kyoiku, laqi muyas mniq knluwanan dniyi pnsnakan 7 ka kcka sweyyeyn smluhay pnyasan. Kiya mi uka mndungus bay mttuku sweynyeyn ka Luxembourg, mniq qnlhangan icil smluhay knou bay sweyci muyas ka knbaka balay. Quri so niyi Belgium, France mi Germany na pyasan tubeyhing ka muda tukubeycu balay so niyi knbeyhing bay hnyuwan qpahun. Laqi muyas pnyas tubeyhing Luxembourg saya pa to bay mniq qnlhangan icil mangal sucugyo patas pnsdhuwan mnhdu muyas, kiya mi wa mniq qnlhangan icil muya pyasan tubeyhing u hmrinas 6000 hiyi sediq. Ya bay 19.6% na laqi muyas pa mniq pyasan tubeyhing qnlhangan Germany cuce (Tukubeycu ka quri so kci seymung ringyu mi ida nkiya kswey), kiya mi 22.6% laqi muyas ka mniq qnlhangan Belgium mi France muyas pyasan tubeyhing. Mnhdu phiyu pyasan tubeyhing Luxembourg daw, kasi ka ndwanun smdhu ka sweysu Keyngkyo tuwey, kiya mi smdhu pusu lhayan keyjay Luxembourg. Uxay wana so Kiya kasi ka pkrana lmawa laqi muyas qnlhangan icil miyah muyas Luxembourg Kiya mi Luxembourg u muda smruwa mnuyas sucugyo patas pnsdhuwan mnhdu muyas pyasan laqi muyas qnlhangan icil u mqriqu uri, tukubeycu bay ka quri laqi muyas mnhdu muyas pyasan tubeyhing Germany, mray so mniq Germany EG mpsalu sapah pnway u kasi ka mnuda 4 kngkawas smluhay qmpah, mniq Luxembourg u uka brahan mangal patas pnsdhuwan. So niyi Luxembourg u kiya ka niqan nanaq pyasan tubeyhing 'Institut Supérieur de Technologie' Cuyey kyoiku Kci cincyey kyoiku u muda mrana 3 kngkawas muynyeyn smluhay, tukubeycu sweynyeyn smluhay, trahuc niyi ka tu3 uuda kyoiku: kngkawas kongyi uxay uri u kongsangyey cuyey slhayan, uxay wana ciyey mi France kongri kci pyasan tubaraw (Lycée Technique) kcka ka 2 yeyn sitong mud muda mniq kingal pusu lhayan sapah pyasan. Mnhdu muyas daw niqan knkla kc mi knkla qqpahun psdhu skeyng CATP. So niyi quri uuda cuyey kyoiku u mniq qpahun uka mpsluhay pa ou balay kiya. kngkawas ka kci kyoiku, dhuq mangal patas pnsdhuwan kci. Mniq kci congsin 4 kngkawas ka kyoiku, dhuq mangal kingal kci cincyey kyoiku patas pnsdhuwan mnhdu muyas. Cyun-su Niqan heytay klelu Luxembourg mi heytay tukarac Luxembourg ka Luxembourg, uka heytay ucilung ka Luxembourg. Pnyahan pnatas(參考資料 CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabug

= Loxemboorg = Gaga kska Owcow ka Loxemboorg, 49 45 N, 6 10 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 2,586 sq km(hangan na o Tg179) (knlbanga dxgal o 2,586 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 582,291 hiyi. Gaga Loxemboorg ka poso alang paro, jiyax 23 idas 6 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Loxemboorg ga wada sogan 50.70% ka dxgal qpahan, 33.50% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 15.80% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Henri, pnaah hngkawas2000 idas 10 jiyax 7pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Loxemboorg = Loxemboorg Takongkwo o splawa Loxemboorg, mtlibo mtqiri Loxemboorg ka France, Germany, Belgiom, wa mniq Oco mi qnlhangan neyro ka Loxemboorg, kiya ka mnsngari morox bay Takongkwo mniq Oco saya, soto ka Loxemboorg so. Tomal kcka Omong ka Loxemboorg, alaw kcka tndxral pa niqan Hoing Oco, Snciying Oco, Oco Toco Inhang mi knoo bay Omong ciko kiya splawa babaw lmotoc Porosayar mi Straspaw Oco na "To3 Soto". Ri-s Rikisi Loxemboorg pa speyyah kndadax congsoci cida smnlowan qnalang qnhlangan Loxemboorg prading smnro. Mnhdo smmalo qnalang qnhlangan daw, prading kndodol mrana kana ka sssiyaw niya, wada mssli kingal beyhing alang mkbrnox. Wa mniq nniqan mndongos bay ccbowan ka Loxemboorg, France, Germany mi Netherlands pa snbeyhing bay qmita kana, kntto yahan mssriyox knrmox mangal qnlhangan icil ka Loxemboorg. 19 th cida, Loxemboorg o prading mdokorico qnlhangan dhiya nanaq qmlahang dhiya nanaq, kiya mi spoda Netherlands Ryeynhe Wangkwo qmhahang, dhoq dokorico ka Belgiom, kiya ka wada ptalax qmnlahang Netherlands ka Loxemboorg. Ana so wada pkla kari moda pnwaya congri ka Loxemboorg, binaw mniq 20 th pa, mnsnposal yahan knrmox mangal Germany ka Loxemboorg. Tomn1 qnlangan beyhing mccbo cida kngkawas 1914 idas 8 diyax 2, Doico Tikwo o moda Sorihon Keykako mi wada ini biyaw knrmox mangal Loxemboorg mi knrmox cnbo Belgiom mi France, wada trawah ka ccbowan toiwil, Tomn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbo iyax cida, dnmowi hmrinas mkmaxal pociping ka Loxemboorg o, alaw mmosa knrmox Belgiom mi France mi wada dan knrmox Nacwey Doico ka Loxemboorg ori, wada pkixan msopo Tongmongkwo mccbo, kiya mi miyah cnbo ka Doico cida o tnayis bay wada ngalang Doico ka Loxemboorg, Tomn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbo o wana Loxemboorg ka tomal mccbo mi oka ana taxa mhoqil. Babaw Tomn2 qnlangan knbeyhing mccbo daw, ini oda pnwaya congri ka Loxemboorg da, wada mwaya balay pnhiyo Peyyey mi Omong kaying qnlhangan ori. Ceng-c Pnwaya moda Cyonco Phiyo Kngpo ka Loxemboorg. Yeso qnlhangan ka Takong Loxemboorg, kiya ka knkana Oco morox bay Takongkwo. Kiya mi biyax dmowi singcng o neyke ka moda dmowi biyax. Kokoingkay o niqan 60 hiyi, mntxan o 5 kngkawas ka diyax qpahon gying. Sing-ceng cyo-hwa Loxemboorg pa psnakan 12 keyng, trahoc o psowan 102 ka socn Dongan. Niqan 12 socn o mndongos bay hnyowan alang mkbrnox ka Loxemboorg, kiya mi Loxemboorg alang mkbrnox beyhing ka tobeyhing bay alang mkbrnox. Cyo ka mnto1 ci singcng cyohwa Loxemboorg, mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 10 diyax 3 cida daw wada plihan da. Kngkawas 1659 dhoq kngkawas 1839 iyax cida, Loxemboorg o wada psnakan 3 honcyo, kiya mi hiti daw wada mndoma dxral Belgiom, France mi Germany saya da, tndxral Loxemboorg pa kndadax 10,700 pinghwang km mlih dhoq 2,586 pinghwang km saya. Keyng na Loxemboorg Kapeyron keyng (1), Kraywo keyng (2), Tikisi keyng (3), Aysitnah keyng (4), Aarcet Hpanays keyng (5), Kreywenmah keyng (6), Loxemboorg keyng (7), Meyars keyng (8), Reytangjo keyng (9), Reymisi keyng (10), Hoyantng keyng (11), Weyarc keyng (12) Ti-ri Loxemboorg o wa mniq Toiwil Oco dxral kcka, lnlingay dxral o baraw ka todaya mitroma ka tohonac, narac o lmotoc Germany ka tonarac, lmotoc France ka tohonac, lmotoc Belgiom ka todaya mi toiwil. Todaya o tobaraw dxral Yaayting, tqapor bay lmiqo, tohonac o dxral llbo dwiyaq. Knbaka ka knkarac, mnknkarac moxol tay hayyangsing, mndongos bay qtan ka lnlingay. Soto Loxemboorg alang mkbrnox beyhing o splawa dha "Alang mkbrnox phpah". Kari bay xxiloy kwang. Hini ori o poso balay ddaon cong th. Knbaraw balay dwiyaq ka dwiyaq Kneyho, knbaraw niya o 560 m. Mabang 1 m dwiyaq Pokporac, kiya o tqowan balay sediq knbaraw bay dwiyaq Loxemboorg ka dwiyaq Pokporac. Cing-ci Niqan knkana qnlangan babaw dxral knoo bay jncyon GDP ka Loxemboorg. Kndadax1999 prading, ida nanaq Oyeyncyo ori ka Loxemboorg. Poso balay stmanan keyjay Loxemboorg o qori kongyey, saya daw knbeyhing bay cinjong congsin knkana mtqiri qnlangan babaw dxral ori. Loxemboorg ka poso balay kcka Oyeycyo sjn inhang congsin mi knkana qnlangan to2 toco sintwo congsin (msnol Amirika). Se-hwey Minjoko Knhbrawan sediq Loxemboorg pa kiya ka knkana qnlhangan Loxemboorg 50.9%. Mnsediq Oropa mi Tasiyang-Porotihay reysing ka sediq Loxemboorg. Kari Kari ddiyon seyho Loxemboorg ka kari France, kari Germany, kari Loxemboorg. 'Qnlhangan mohing elo jyojika' o oo klowanan kari ddiyon rmngaw pa, alaw ka hbaraw oo klowanan minjoko ka mnsopo mniq kiya ka so kiya, kiya mi Loxemboorg o oxay so kiya kiya, qnlhangan niyi pnsltodan dha o poso bay minjoko ka wana morox bay kingal- kiya ka Loxemboorg minjoko, minjoko niyi pa qori so dara dha o msdalih hari Franse, binaw qori so rikisi pa bsiyaq bay pnloban kari Germany na 'Knmalo bay Roma Tikwo' ori, kiya mi baraw Oco kongting o dmowi bay dmowi kari Franse pprngaw ka lohay pnsltodan dha, kiya ka wada so niyi ddiyon bay ppatas ka kari Germany mi kari Franse da, kiya o oxay balay dnowi qori ppatas ka kari Loxemboorg pa, ddiyon balay pprngaw kari kddiyax kiya. Kari Loxemboorg o tokingal cida kari Frank, poso bay dmowi kari niyi o wa mniq nniqan yayong Mocear mi mslotoc na alang mkbrnox Germany mi France. Ana so mntobaraw dxral kari Germany na kari Congsi joko ka kari Loxemboorg, binaw niqan hmrinas 5000 ka poso kari Franse. Alaw ka kari tnposo, kari Loxemboorg o sediq Loxemboorg pa ngalan dha 'Kari qori qcahor', ddiyon pprngaw kari kndosan kddiyax mi oxay ddiyon qori ppatas. Pnwaya kcka kyoiko o pspowan dmowi ka kari Loxemboorg, kari Germany mi kari France, psdkanon dmowi mi ini pqqada. Pyasan tiping laqi so ttiping o dmowi kari Loxemboorg tmsa moyas, tobeyhing hari laqi moyas daw prading dmowi kari Germany tmsa, pyasan kcka daw prading snbarah dmowi kari France Dongan. Mdho dmowi to3 kari niyi o mpqhdo moyas pyasan tobaraw ka sediq qnlhangan daha, so kiya o niqan dmka ka laqi mnoyas pyasan tobaraw o ini dhoq mangal patas socogyo. Mniq so niyi ka pnwaya dha pa, laqi sediq tnhdil (qori so sediq tnhdilan oxay pneyyah Oco) o ini hari qndhoq. Hbaraw balay qnlhangan icil cyawmin ka Loxemboorg, hmrinas knkana qnhbrawan qnhlangan 30% knhbrawan, knhbaraw bay sediq tnhdilan qnpringan ka sediq Portogal mi sediq Italiana. Miyah ka dhiya cida o madas kari dha nanaq ori. Binaw, kari Portogal mi kari Italiana o wana srwanan nanaq ddiyon pprngaw sediq tnhdilan, mniq so knhbrawan pnsliyan o ini hari dowi kiya. Cong-cyaw Hbaraw bay ka smlohay Teynskyo, niqan doma ka smlohay snhiyan icil ori (kiya ka knkana Kiristo borah kyo mi Yodayakyo). Bongka Ngalan Qnlangan bonghka yican ka nniqan smodal alang mkbrnox mi nniqan qqlahang mccbo Loxemboorg. Damac ooqon Loxemboorg pa wada rol qnlhangan Germany, France mi Belgiom kiya mi qnlhangan icil ssiyaw ori. Ttgsa Mniq Loxemboorg pa, 11 kngkawas ka kokomin yiwo kyoiko: Snpiyah laqi moyas pyasan ttiring 2 kngkawas, poso slxan kyoiko o 6 kngkawas mi 3 kngkawas ka cincyey kyoiko. So kiya o niqal 1 mi 3 bnkowan ka pnwaya kyoiko dah (Pyasan totiring, pyasan totiping, pyasan tobaraw). Laqi moyas moyas ryo o dhoq 100%. Pnwaya kyoiko Loxemboorg pa niqan oo bay ooda pprngaon nina, mray so dmowi oo bay diyax moda smlohay kari Germany, kari France mi kari Eygo, kiya ori o tokobeyco ka smlohay kari Germany o hbaraw ka ini pndongos, rmngaw kari Roman joko tnhdil qnlhangan icil na laqi moyas ka knhbrawan balay. Kndadax kngkawas 1999 daw, mniq 2 kngkawas pyasan totoring brah han o moda 1 Kngkawas pnsrmalan moyas pyasan totiring; so niyi o laqi tiring o malo smlohay qori Kari, syakay, qori sapah pyasan o, malo mangal kingal mndongos syakayhwa. Mniq babaw 6 kngkawas pyasan poso lhayan daw malo omao 2 elo kyoiko pyasan tokcka ka laqi moyas: 1. Kci kawci pyasan tokcka (67% laqi moyas), qolo bay moyas 3 kngkawas dhoq socogyo (CATP) kiya ori o mtmay pyasan tobeyhing brah cida o knkana bay o dmowi kngkawas 6 dhoq 7 kngkawas. 2. Potong pyasan tobaraw (33% laqi moyas). 7 kngkawas daw socogyo mi mangal patas pnsdhowan mnhdo moyas kiya mi malo mtmay moyas pyasan tobeyhing. Pnwaya kyoiko tico niyi o kiya ka knkana qnlhangan to2 knoo syakay yosang 11.3%. Binaw qori so 15 kngkawas laqi moyas mniq kcka mtqiri qnlangan knkla laqi moyas pingko keykako o ida so mntna hari kana. Pyasan tobaraw klowanan kyoiko Kndadax kngkawas 2003 daw niqan 1 dokorico pyasan tobeyhing Loxemboorg, kiya mi snpeyyah kngkawas 2001 prading smmalo phiyo. Mniq qori iswey ringyo, ida nkiya kswey, kci, horico, keyjay, slhayan syakay mi slhayan kyoiko, laqi moyas mniq knlowanan dniyi pnsnakan 7 ka kcka sweyyeyn smlohay pnyasan. Kiya mi oka mndongos bay mttoko sweynyeyn ka Loxemboorg, mniq qnlhangan icil smlohay knoo bay sweyci moyas ka knbaka balay. Qori so niyi Belgiom, France mi Germany na pyasan tobeyhing ka moda tokobeyco balay so niyi knbeyhing bay hnyowan qpahon. Laqi moyas pnyas tobeyhing Loxemboorg saya pa to bay mniq qnlhangan icil mangal socogyo patas pnsdhowan mnhdo moyas, kiya mi wa mniq qnlhangan icil moya pyasan tobeyhing o hmrinas 6000 hiyi sediq. Ya bay 19.6% na laqi moyas pa mniq pyasan tobeyhing qnlhangan Germany coce (Tokobeyco ka qori so kci seymong ringyo mi ida nkiya kswey), kiya mi 22.6% laqi moyas ka mniq qnlhangan Belgiom mi France moyas pyasan tobeyhing. Mnhdo phiyo pyasan tobeyhing Loxemboorg daw, kasi ka ndwanon smdho ka sweyso Keyngkyo towey, kiya mi smdho poso lhayan keyjay Loxemboorg. Uxay wana so Kiya kasi ka pkrana lmawa laqi moyas qnlhangan icil miyah moyas Loxemboorg Kiya mi Loxemboorg o moda smrowa mnoyas socogyo patas pnsdhowan mnhdo moyas pyasan laqi moyas qnlhangan icil o mqriqo ori, tokobeyco bay ka qori laqi moyas mnhdo moyas pyasan tobeyhing Germany, mray so mniq Germany EG mpsalo sapah pnway o kasi ka mnoda 4 kngkawas smlohay qmpah, mniq Loxemboorg o oka brahan mangal patas pnsdhowan. So niyi Loxemboorg o kiya ka niqan nanaq pyasan tobeyhing 'Institot Sopérieor de Technologie' Coyey kyoiko Kci cincyey kyoiko o moda mrana 3 kngkawas moynyeyn smlohay, tokobeyco sweynyeyn smlohay, trahoc niyi ka to3 ooda kyoiko: kngkawas kongyi oxay ori o kongsangyey coyey slhayan, oxay wana ciyey mi France kongri kci pyasan tobaraw (Lycée Techniqoe) kcka ka 2 yeyn sitong mod moda mniq kingal poso lhayan sapah pyasan. Mnhdo moyas daw niqan knkla kc mi knkla qqpahon psdho skeyng CATP. So niyi qori ooda coyey kyoiko o mniq qpahon oka mpslohay pa oo balay kiya. kngkawas ka kci kyoiko, dhoq mangal patas pnsdhowan kci. Mniq kci congsin 4 kngkawas ka kyoiko, dhoq mangal kingal kci cincyey kyoiko patas pnsdhowan mnhdo moyas. Cyon-so Niqan heytay klelo Loxemboorg mi heytay tokarac Loxemboorg ka Loxemboorg, oka heytay ocilong ka Loxemboorg. Pnyahan pnatas(參考資料 CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabog
